attributes.name: assetId
attributes.doc: the appearance asset used for rendering

attributes.name: looped
attributes.doc: if true the animation is looped

attributes.name: offset
attributes.doc: current offset into the played animation in milliseconds

attributes.name: playing
attributes.doc: if true the animation is playing; gets set to false if the end of the animation is reached and looping is disabled

attributes.name: replaySpeed
attributes.doc: the replay speed used for playing the animation; i.e. a speed factor of 2 means doubled playing speed
